main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

generateExportsField.description: Update the output package.json file's 'exports' field. This field is used by Node and bundles.

additionalEntryPoints.description: Additional entry-points to add to exports field in the package.json file.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

tsConfig.description: The path to the Typescript configuration file.

swcrc.description: The path to the SWC configuration file. Default: .swcrc

skipTypeCheck.description: Whether to skip TypeScript type checking.

swcExclude.description: List of SWC Glob/Regex to be excluded from compilation (https://swc.rs/docs/configuration/compilation#exclude).

external.description: A list projects to be treated as external. This feature is experimental
external.x-deprecated: Make sure all dependencies are buildable by running `nx g @nx/js:setup-build`. This option will be removed in Nx 20.

externalBuildTargets.description: List of target names that annotate a build target for a project

generateLockfile.description: Generate a lockfile (e.g. package-lock.json) that matches the workspace lockfile to ensure package versions match.

stripLeadingPaths.description: Remove leading directory from output (e.g. src). See: https://swc.rs/docs/usage/cli#--strip-leading-paths

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.
